name: Writhed
script:
if ak.ai() then return end
if matches[2] and IsTargetted(matches[2]) then
   affstrack.impale = false
   ak.scoreup(matches[2])
elseif not matches[2] then
   affstrack.impale = false
   ak.scoreup(target)
end
matches: ^With a look of agony on [\w'\-]+ face\, ([\w'\-]+) manages to writhe (herself|himself) free of the weapon which impaled [\w'\-]+\.$
^With a vicious snarl you carve a merciless swathe through the steaming guts of ([\w'\-]+)\, who gurgles and chokes as you withdraw your dripping blade\, glistening with gore\.$
^With a vicious snarl [\w'\-]+ carves a merciless swathe through the steaming guts of ([\w'\-]+)\, who gurgles and chokes as [\w'\-]+ withdraws [\w'\-]+ dripping blade\, glistening with gore\.$
^With a snarl of contempt\, you allow ([\w'\-]+) to slide free of your weapon\.$
You have no victim impaled to be able to perform a disembowelment.
^As ([\w'\-]+) wrenches away from you\, your blade rips through his innards in a violentfashion\, leaving a pool of viscera where your foe once lay\.$
